title: Coronavirus: Two US towns, two very different experiences
description: In some parts of the country, lives have changed unrecognisably, while elsewhere people say life is largely unchanged.
content:
Image copyrightToby ThomasImage caption
 The town of New London, Ohio is one place coping with coronavirus differently
After coursing through New York and other cities, Covid-19 is now hitting small towns, in different ways. Here's a look at how one in Ohio… [+9380 chars]
